decision.name: CTMS_initializeEmailNotificationParameters
decision.description: Initializes and stores the date intervals (fromDays & toDays), email subject, and email body to their respective process variables
decision.definition: fn!override_exception_appian_internal(fn!with(local!decisiondefinition: a!decisiondesigner_cache(uuid: "54d353dc-88ae-4aa3-952d-70b3b82a9e0e",versionKey: "141b8186-2ace-4b69-b3ab-87b2bfc098f6",value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dd"(hitPolicy:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dhp"("RULE_ORDER"), inputs:{#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_di"(name:"Initialize", type:'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean', id:1, restrictionType:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dirt"("NONE"))}, outputs:{#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_do"(id:1, name:"fromDays", type:'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer', restrictionType:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dort"("NONE"), returnListType:false), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_do"(id:2, name:"toDays", type:'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer', restrictionType:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dort"("NONE"), returnListType:false), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_do"(id:3, name:"emailSubject", type:'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text', restrictionType:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dort"("NONE"), returnListType:false), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_do"(id:4, name:"emailBody", type:'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text', restrictionType:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dort"("NONE"), returnListType:false)}, rules:{#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dr"(id:1, inputs:{#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dri"(id:1, decisionInputId:1, operator:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dop"(operator:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dopt"("EQUALS"), value1:true))}, outputs:{#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dro"(id:1, decisionOutputId:1, value:14), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dro"(id:5, decisionOutputId:2, value:33), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dro"(id:8, decisionOutputId:3, value:"PharmaCorp Study {####} - Site {####} Documents Expiring Soon"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dro"(id:11, decisionOutputId:4, value:"{Salutation} {Last Name}," & fn!char(10) & " One or more of your documents for PharmaCorp Study {####} - Site {####} are expiring within 30 days. Please log into SiteConnect and upload current/updated versions." & fn!char(10) & " Sincerely," & fn!char(10) & " PharmaCorp Document Compliance Team")}), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dr"(id:2, inputs:{#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dri"(id:3, decisionInputId:1, operator:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dop"(operator:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dopt"("EQUALS"), value1:true))}, outputs:{#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dro"(id:2, decisionOutputId:1, value:0), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dro"(id:6, decisionOutputId:2, value:14), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dro"(id:9, decisionOutputId:3, value:"Second Notice: PharmaCorp Study {####} - Site {####} Documents Expiring Soon"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dro"(id:12, decisionOutputId:4, value:"{Salutation} {Last Name}," & fn!char(10) & " One or more of your documents for PharmaCorp Study {####} - Site {####} are expiring within the next 14 days. Please log into SiteConnect and upload current/updated versions. A copy of this notification was also sent to the PharmaCorp Study Manager for Study {####}. " & fn!char(10) & " Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter." & fn!char(10) & " Sincerely," & fn!char(10) & " PharmaCorp Document Compliance Team")}), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dr"(id:3, inputs:{#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dri"(id:5, decisionInputId:1, operator:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dop"(operator:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dopt"("EQUALS"), value1:true))}, outputs:{#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dro"(id:3, decisionOutputId:1, value:-60), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dro"(id:7, decisionOutputId:2, value:0), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dro"(id:10, decisionOutputId:3, value:"Expired: PharmaCorp Study {####} - Site {####} Documents"), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dro"(id:13, decisionOutputId:4, value:"{Salutation} {Last Name}," & fn!char(10) & " One or more of your documents for PharmaCorp Study {####} - Site {####} has expired. Please log into SiteConnect and upload current/updated versions. A copy of this notification was also sent to the PharmaCorp Study Manager for Study {####}. " & fn!char(10) & " Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter." & fn!char(10) & " Sincerely," & fn!char(10) & " PharmaCorp Document Compliance Team")})})),#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_exr"(decisionDefinition:local!decisiondefinition,executionInputs:{#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dd_dei"(decisionInputId:1,value:'ri!Initialize')})))
